addr: 61-65 Great Queen Street London WC2B 5BZ GB
title: The Official Postgraduate Winter Ball
desc: THE?POSTGRADUATE WINTER BALL Tuesday 8th December? The Postgraduate Winter Ball is a time honoured annual tradition, hosted in the first week of December. It's an opportunity to celebrate the end of term before everyone goes their separate way for vacation. This is a date that should be etched on every postgraduates calendar. Hosted at the discerning central London venue the dress code is strictly formal, so think timeless style. Organised by students from the following Universities...? UCL || LSE || UAL || KCL || CASS || LBS || QMU || HULT || SOAS || IMPERIAL || WESTMINSTER || REGENTS || GSU (SWAY and University Socials retain the right to refuse entry, please refrain from excessive consumption of alcohol. Drunks will not be admitted. Be sure to bring photographic I.D. either International passport or EU driving license.We additionally advise arriving no later than 10.00pm as the venue does get very busy and we will not guarantee entry after 11pm. Tickets are non refundable, however they are transferable (please notify the University Socials team via. Facebook) LAST ENTRY WITH ADVANCED TICKET - 11pm
